author: Alib234
long_description:
A mod that adds colored string and the ability to create wool from 4 strings and viceversa

as for what the strings do outside of being able to turn back into wool

the answer is: **nothing!**(for now, idk if I'll make it useful, that might be for someone smart and or creative and or patient to do, or maybe in another mod)
name: coloredstrings
short_description: Adds colored strings and allows to create wool from 4 strings and viceversa
title: Colored Strings
